assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Creating data model design. Practical work. Different data structures and modeling.. Database development and SQL.
description.et:
Käsitleb andmemudelite projekteerimise loomisega seonduvaid teemasid. Praktilise töö käigus modelleeritakse erinevaid 
andmestruktuure, luuakse andmebaase ja töötatakse SQL-keelega.

objectives.en: The aim of he course is to provide an overview of database design methodologies, database development and management methods, and
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade andmebaaside kavandamise metoodikatest, andmebaaside loomise ning käsitlemise meetoditest ja

objectives.en: the use of database systems in the development of information systems.

learning_outcomes.en: After completing the course the student:
- knows the process of creating a data model, the techniques used and how to use the data processing language SQL.
learning_outcomes.et: - teab andmemudeli koostamise protsessi, kasutatavaid tehnikaid ning kuidas kasutada andmekäsitluskeelt SQL.

learning_outcomes.en: - knows techniques for optimising data processing, locking mechanisms in databases and problems with locking.
learning_outcomes.et: - teab andmekäsitluse optimeerimise tehnikaid, lukustusmehhanisme andmebaasides ja lukustamisega kaasnevaid probleeme.

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the basic rules of normalisation and denormalisation, anomalies of different normals.
learning_outcomes.et: - teab normaliseerimise ja denormaliseerimise elementaarseid reegleid, erinevate normaalkujude anomaaliaid.

learning_outcomes.en: - understands the problems arising from user rights.
- has an overview of the database management operations and the use of indices in the databases.
learning_outcomes.et: - ülevaadet andmebaaside haldamiseks tehtavatest toimingutest ja indeksite kasutamisest andmebaasides.

learning_outcomes.en: - creates independently smaller information systems based on database systems.
learning_outcomes.et: - loob iseseisvalt väiksemaid andmebaasisüsteemidel põhinevaid infosüsteeme.

learning_outcomes.en: - participates in the development processes of large information systems.
